attributes.action: Allow free parking to ALL NHS workers
attributes.additional_details: During the covid 19 pandemic the nhs have been the frontline heroes, yet they are still been charged to park and do their jobs
attributes.background: The fact that nhs workers have to pay for parking is an absolute joke, whqt other workers do you know that have to pay to work for their company?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560696
